ygData.subject: EQ Testing Procedure
ygData.msgSnippet: I found the last statement to be very contradicting.  Hasn t the bard community, on numerous occasions to no avail, sent Verant extensive test results proving
ygData.messageBody:
I found the last statement to be very contradicting. Hasn't the bard
community, on numerous occasions to no avail, sent Verant extensive test
results proving that some of our songs weren't working properly? Wonder why
they are now asking players to send them test results when they seem to have
ignored ours for the most part?

Hopefully GZ's response to Rokenn's post will have good news and Verant will
agree that the bardic issues we have raised need to be addressed.

Galtin of E'ci


> Well, here you have it straight from the EQ team themselves. In an
> excerpt
> from the test server:
>
> We would appreciate diligent testing of this change, to insure that no
> unforeseen problems have been caused by it.
>
> -The EverQuest Team
>
>
